title: Apple should make iOS 16 customization more like Android’s: Here’s what I want to see
content:
Apple doesn’t offer truly individualized customization of its products or interfaces to its users, and if anyone wants to customize the look of their Apple products – specifically their home screens – they’re in for A Time. With iOS 16 coming in September, there’s an opportunity for Apple to give consumers needed autonomy.

more…

The post Apple should make iOS 16 customization more like Android’s: Here’s what I want to see appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's forthcoming iOS 16, to be released in September, should take cues from Android's customization options, giving users more autonomy.
